column5: with steelhead season coming closer anyone interested in upgrading reel bearing in their pins and not only, i found a nice website that sells bearings for most of the reels, orders over $12 they ship for free. http://www.bocabearings.com/main1.aspx?p=s...ossref&pg=5

Reel tuning seems more common on the west coast. It has puzzled me why this has not been brought up on OFC before as there are ways to make many reels perform better. Thanks for posting.  outdoorguy61
Thanks for the link. Looks like my reels are getting an upgrade. Nice winter project.  Thanks again, Daniel
